<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target claims to have no vector registers early return.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>-&gt;getNumberOfRegisters(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>-&gt;getRegisterClassForType(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SBVec: Target has no vector registers, return.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SBVec: Analyzing &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; LLVMF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#adb5c319f5905c1d3ca9eb5df546388c5">getName</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early return if the attribute NoImplicitFloat is used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LLVMF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#afb28a4deafe2954b0534cc6399ce518b">hasFnAttribute</a>(Attribute::NoImplicitFloat)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SBVec: NoImplicitFloat attribute, return.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create SandboxIR for LLVMF and run BottomUpVec on it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  sandboxir::Function &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = &#42;Ctx-&gt;createFunction(&amp;LLVMF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  sandboxir::Analyses <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>(&#42;AA, &#42;SE, &#42;TTI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Change = FPM.runOnFunction(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given that sandboxir::Context &#96;Ctx&#96; is defined at a pass-level scope, the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maps from LLVM IR to Sandbox IR may go stale as later passes remove LLVM IR</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// objects. To avoid issues caused by this clear the context&#39;s state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: The alternative would be to define Ctx and FPM within runOnFunction()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  Ctx-&gt;clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Change;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
